CSSMediaRule.summary: The CSSMediaRule interface represents a single CSS @media rule.

CSSMediaRuleMedia.summary: The read-only media property of the interface contains a object representing the media query list of the {{cssxref("@media")}} rule.
CSSMediaRuleMedia.value: A object.Although the media property itself is read-only in the sense that you can't replace the MediaList object, you can still assign to the media property directly, which is equivalent to assigning to its property. You can also modify the MediaList object using the and methods.
